title: FT:T215 & Piedmont Split Back for Your T206 Cobbs-Pix Added
author: lug-nut

posts.post_title: FT:T215 & Piedmont Split Back for Your T206 Cobbs-Pix Added
posts.post_content:
I have an SGC 40 T215 Red Cross Russ Ford and a PSA T206 Howell Piedmont split back (50/50) available for trade for a lower graded 1.5-3.5 T206 Cobb in non common backs. No Sweet Caporal, Piedmont, Polar Bear. I may have to throw in a couple bucks as most likely I'd be looking for the following backs:

American Beauty, Sovereign, Old Mill, Tolstoi, EPDG, maybe Cycle

The T215 and T206 are not for sale, please send scans of possible trades of Cobbs to [url]madolfi1968@yahoo.com[/url]
